website_summaries.verdict: Best fit for beginners who want to reference a tangible instruction sheet.
pros: Includes large poster with photos of exercises
Suggestions include moves for beginning, intermediate
Beloved by those who like to do Pilates while traveling
cons: Some feel ring doesn't offer enough resistance

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Pilates Ring and Accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT pilates ring and actually it's my spare to take with me as I travel. Love the carry bag and the wall chart. What I did was cut these pictures into single how-to pages (separating them into Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced) stapled at the corner and now all I have to do is flip through and work-out with the instructional photos. Just place in that handy bag and go. Way to go Mantra Sports!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vesta Mashburn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This things is dope. Such a high resistance in my opinion. I specifically bought this for a thigh workout but I can see immediately all the workouts that can be achieved with it. Great price too. I considered several other brands for higher prices toget the best. In the end I chose this one and it’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, didn't love
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well-constructed, light-weight ring. So it'll probably work great for someone who wants that. I didn't provide enough resistance for me. I just got tired, trying to hold it in place, without good muscle fatigue. I ended up purchasing a metal, heavier-weight ring which worked really well for what I was needing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for travel but I am now using it every single day even when not travelling!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. I was so impressed by the quality and resistance on this Magic Circle that I have set aside my other Magic Circle from Gaiam (as the Gaiam circle is too squishee without really good resistance and feels like it will break) and I am using the Mantra Magic Circle everyday not just for travel. It is a perfect size to fit into luggage and there is no other out there like it. If you are serious about your Magic Circle exercises and doing it everywhere you go, then this is the Magic Circle for you!
customer_reviews.author: MLawrence

customer_reviews.title: First time Circle user
customer_reviews.text: First time Pilates Circle user. My friend told me I needed one so I ordered this one. I liked the bag and the name, Mantra. Yes packaging is important. The poster size is large and that's a good thing. I can see it as I'm attempting to use the circle. I do wish I could have a video and other Pilates components with it, as in a kit, but that's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This is very sturdy and seems like it will hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the quality of this ring. There are a bunch of these on Amazon and I had a hard time choosing which one to order. This is very sturdy and seems like it will hold up well. I used it yesterday for some inner thigh work and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JulieD5671

customer_reviews.title: Ring with chart - very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I used one at physical therapy and my therapist recommended I buy one. This one looked promising on Amazon. Have been using it since it arrived and am very happy with it. It performs as promised. The chart is very helpful - it contains a few exercises that I did not do at physical therapy but I am doing now. The order was delivered ahead of schedule. Excelent service.
customer_reviews.author: Bernd H. Reimers

customer_reviews.title: This one's a GEM
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC !! in all aspects. Extremely well made, comfortable...even the storage bag is top quality, Then we get to the exercise wall chart. If you're just starting out or progressing to higher levels, this chart easily guides you from beginner to advanced, with targeted exercises for those areas you want to strengthen. As a beginner, I'd be lost without it. Nathalie, the owner, takes enormous pride in her products and service. If there are ANY questions or concerns, she will jump through hoops to help you. An exceptional value for $25.00. Pretty sure you'll love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JoMCK

customer_reviews.title: Simple is best.
customer_reviews.text: It can be confusing to me about activating the correct muscles to gain a Pilates benefit. I have overused the wrong muscles in the past which makes it harder to correct. By using the magic circle, I was able to feel and engage the correct muscles in various exercises. I am on the way to correcting past mistakes and using the correct muscles. This simple device is helping me with balance, movement and control of my body. A great addition to my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.Prager

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I love this magic circle - looks great and works great.... and I really like the large poster that accompanied it as well - good exercise clearly explained and graphically attractive too .... I really love the fun orange, it sparks 'joy' for me. :) I'm really glad I purchased this, and would recommend it for others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it for very long and use it as part of my physical therapy for an injured ankle and knees. Like the chart for exercies and the bag to carry it in. thought it came with a dvd but that most of been a more expensive one. It seems sturdy and good quality. Thought the price was decent and it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: imfaithdriven

customer_reviews.title: Great for thigh work
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these "magic circles" in my Pilates classes for a long time, but when I learned a particular couple of thigh exercises I could do with it, that's when I decided I had to have one at home. I do a couple of simple things for abductors and adductors with this ring, and it really helps. Of course, there are many other types of exercises you can do with it, and the box includes a chart demonstrating them. It's a nice sturdy piece of equipment that comes with a little storage bag that hangs off of a hook in my exercise area. I'm very happy with my magic circle.
customer_reviews.author: AnnLD

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your home gym or studio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to anyone's fitness equipment. I especially like it for strengthening the neck muscles, but it is useful for a wide variety of exercises and comes with a great wall poster giving you ideas of how to use it. And you will absolutely adore the emails from Nathalie, the Obsessive Customer Service Geek checking in on your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves the Mantra Sports Pilates Ring Magic Fitness Circle at home & her group workout.
customer_reviews.text: I got the Mantra Sports Pilates Ring Magic Fitness Circle for my daughter's birthday gift and she loves it and said she can use it at home and at her group workout. Her words was love it Dad. It helps her stay fit doing her riding.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS BARBATO

customer_reviews.title: This the best one & the included exercise chart is great
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I bought. Gave one to my son he uses it often (he’s 44) & says it helps him a lot. I use them 3 times weekly. We especially like the large chart you include which shows all the types of different exercises. I think it’s the best out of all the others offered on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Louie

customer_reviews.title: broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: I was squeezing it between my legs and it broke on the 2nd day I had it. I might be able to use it as a hoop to train my cat to jump through it.
customer_reviews.author: scot

customer_reviews.title: The ring already looks and feels worn or bent...out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be getting a firm circle...but I got a wilted oval. I'm returning it for a different brand and better one. I'm afraid if I apply thigh pressure, it will break. It looks malformed, like it was used extensively, returned and then sent to me. Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa!

customer_reviews.title: I would def recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Really been loving my new fitness circle. I'm toning places in my body that had been long forgotten my normally monotonous routine. I've been a very satisfying sort of sore every day after I use it. I would def recommend this product :) Great for stretching too. Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used Pilates rings at studios and wanted one for home use. Because of the Reviews and mfr description I chose Mantra. Got one for my husband as well. Pro: padding adequate Con: “- let me count the ways..” - not enough resistance - measured 12” (pad to pad) or 13” (unpadded sides) so it was bowed after 2 uses and SMALLER than the 14” advertised - ring covering didn’t cover ring fully All around cheap, at least in its current iteration. I’m 68 and don’t do weights above 2# and it wasn’t enough resistance for me! BalancedBody brand.. 15” worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Judy K

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little saw from the workout, but that only means that it was affective and that I was/an truly out-of-shape! Easy to store, does not take up much room. I have it placed alongside my other fitness go-to’s. Definitely recommend. What I like most about it, is that it is only me conducting the workouts-meaning I’m not in a class feeling intimidated because I am not as “advanced” as some of the others would be in a class. Can’t wait to be a size down in my jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates Ring!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Pilates ring for the exercise class I teach. It is well made and a perfect size. Everyone in my class gave the ring a thumb's up. There's so much you can do with a Pilates ring. This ring comes with a chart to show you just how versatile it is as an exercise aid. When I asked questions of the company, they were very nice also. I can tell they are customer service oriented. I highly recommend this ring.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be stronger.
customer_reviews.text: The ring is a little weaker than I expected. The ones my pilates teacher has are stronger. If I squeeze too hard I think I’m going to break it. But as long as I don’t squeeze too hard it works great.
customer_reviews.author: laura martin

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to continue PT work I've been doing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to continue PT work I've been doing in post-surgical therapy, but it is much less resistant than the Pilates Rings I used in patient. Am exchanging it for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this and added it to my workout regiment. I love it. It's sturdy and love the bag and poster that come with it. I am able to take this with me any where I go. Got a email with the poster, so if you lose the paper one, you still will have one. It really works you out good. My arms, chest, legs are all feeling good and strong. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: golden

customer_reviews.title: Great for toning
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing Windsor Pilates for years and the pilates circle that came with the DVD package was losing its tension, so I was really excited to buy another pilates ring/circle at this price, and also have it come with the poster of workouts. That poster is huge and it has a lot of good exercises listed on there. I've definitely been feeling it working in toning muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Mard

customer_reviews.title: Poster is NOT included
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up, the seller emails the poster as a PDF, it's not included in the package which I was kind of bummed about. The seller refunded me a couple bucks, which was nice, but still - would've been ideal to have the phsyical poster to hang up and reference. Great product, but again, wish the poster actually came with it.
customer_reviews.author: A Jam

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this is nice!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, well-made. Comes with it's own carry bag. Great tension. You can feel it working your muscles. Bonus exercise insert is wall-poster size for ease of reference.
customer_reviews.author: NaosGlass

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality. Maybe mine was defective.
customer_reviews.text: My product makes a clicking sound/noise whenever it is squeezed. Not cool. It also slips whenever I put it in between my tights or ankles. Is it too late to return this?
customer_reviews.author: CANri

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great Pilates ring for starters - not super firm, but firm enough to grasp the concept and maintain form.
customer_reviews.author: Erica G

customer_reviews.title: Great device for home exercises.
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. I’m using something similar at PT and wanted one for my home routine. I have found it extremely helpful. It gives you just enough resistance while doing exercises, much more effective than doing the excises with a ball as resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Fairwinds

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Ring!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Pilates instructor and recommend this ring to my clients. The bag is so useful and makes it easy for transport To and from class not to mention fun. The poster is a good visual aide.
customer_reviews.author: jemsweet

customer_reviews.title: I find this product somewhat difficult to use. My ...
customer_reviews.text: I find this product somewhat difficult to use. My main goal was to use it for my inner thigh muscles. I don't use it as much as I thought I would
customer_reviews.author: Bin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product for a great price especially when it includes an exercise chart! Great customer service from the company. They reached out to me personally which was very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: maria farragher

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a Pilates ring advertised on Facebook. But I was sure I could fine the same product on Amazon who I trust. This product is well made and affordable and it comes with a photo guide. Thanks for the quick delivery. I'll need this even more after Thanksgiving!
customer_reviews.author: ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Cellulite gone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doughts, but I LOVE IT!! I especially love how it tones my inner thighs. Cellulite gone!! I also use it to do crunches.
customer_reviews.author: jq

customer_reviews.title: It breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice and it snapped in half, hitting me in the face.
customer_reviews.author: S. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great isometric tool.
customer_reviews.text: Ring kit is sturdy. I like that exercises are on a printed chart and easy to see. I may do what another reviewer did and cut it down and put it into my workout folder. Also comes with a storage bag for the ring so it can be tucked away and kept clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Will be a good addition to your routine
customer_reviews.text: I have never done Pilates so this is my first time using the ring. At times I feel awkward using it, as if its not positioned properly so I have to adjust everso often. I tried using the chart but found that watching the video clips on youtube was more effective. There are quite a bit of different exercises to do so ive started with the simple ones first. Its just my first week. My goal is to tone my thighs and work other areas as I go along. so far I like using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging and the instruction photos. The ring fits very comfortably on legs because of padding. The ring has a little too much bend and may lose shape quickly, but right now it is working great. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, helpful poster guide for all levels, easy exercise and stretching
customer_reviews.text: Love this ring and the poster guide. There are multiple strengths for every level every day. The poster is so awesome I want to frame it. The ring is great, helps with my balance and stretching. I will be purchasing another piece of equipment from Mantra Sports in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Ps redhead

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, provides just the right amount of tension. The cushion grips are comfortable and stays in place. My only complaint is the poster gives instructions on how to do the moves, but does not give guidance on how many reps you should do.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Mantra Sports Ring
customer_reviews.text: I got my new Mantra ring several days ago and I love it. In these trying times of being quarantined, it has been a great new way to workout at home. The huge poster with various exercises and levels is amazing and easy to learn. I look forward to doing new exercises with the ring everyday. I highly recommend the Mantra Ring.
customer_reviews.author: barb s

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Try!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this ring came with exercises and the carry bag. It is resistant but I would prefer it be a bit more sturdy. Great item for the price. I would recommend for those new to using one and/or not hard-core athletes.
customer_reviews.author: APalGA

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying three - it was such a great find I purchased two others for gifts. Wonderful purchase, easy to use, nice case for taking it along on a trip - well made and very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A product worth knowing
customer_reviews.text: In this moment it appears to assist me with my routine the graphics are clear and useful the quality sofar appears to be durable . I would recommend this product now. See if it will stand the test of time
customer_reviews.author: George L. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Pilate's magic fitness ring
customer_reviews.text: I received this as promised, I exercise daily but mostly cardio, this little ring is awesome targets areas that need extra help...butt and inner thigh just started using but so far very impressed! No regrets try it ladies. Very strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Suemouse

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this long but use it every day & do the exercises on the poster. I've already noticed an improvement in flexibility & it has been a big help with shoulder & neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Young

customer_reviews.title: Pilates ring
customer_reviews.text: I love that this pilates ring has a carrying bag and a position and use poster. The only issue I have is that it is suppose to be 14" and neither inside or outside measures 14". I feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: RobBob

customer_reviews.title: It will do what you want it to.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Pretty. Durable. Just hard for me cos I’m older.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: good circle
customer_reviews.text: I like this circle, it provides enough resistance. It's not as large as the one we have at the pilates studio, which is what I was looking for, but that's my fault because I didn't know there were multiple sizes.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: difficult to control
customer_reviews.text: Wife returned it. It was too difficult to control and she feared it would spring out and hit something.
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: After recently starting a Pilates class where I used the ring, I decided to invest in one to continue my stretching at home...this ring has been really good, with enough resistance for at least a beginner. The instruction poster is nice to have but due to the small print and the distance if hung on a wall, I decided to fold up like a map to keep beside me while I progress through the stages. Love the color and bag.
customer_reviews.author: kp3

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to help with the arm jiggle and strengthening my pelvic floor. The instructions that come with the ring give you many options to explore. Excited to get started!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Crain

customer_reviews.title: Good Pilates Ring
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ring to use at home in between Pilate classes. Delivery was fast, product is great. It comes in a carry case which is nice. Also comes with a HUGE instructional photo poster which is nice for a gym or studio, would be nice if it was smaller for home use. Would recommend this to anyone interested in a Pilate ring.
customer_reviews.author: Suelee🐸

customer_reviews.title: not a very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not really like it because it is lack of sturdiness. I used only once, used my legs to hold this circle but it is lack of resilience, the circle shape transform to oval.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I was in need of something inexpensive that could workout my inner thighs and with this my inner thighs were burning as I was using it. It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to workout routine
customer_reviews.text: This Pilates ring is perfect for kicking up my work outs. Sturdy yet flexible and so many exercises can be done with this ring. I purchased the orange ring and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors and good design.
customer_reviews.text: Mantra Sports Pilates Ring Magic Fitness Circle comes with a poster which I find very useful and the Magic circle is both sturdy and good design.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: A blessing in disguise
customer_reviews.text: I am a runner, but a few weeks, I sustained a fifth metatarsal fracture. To stay fit, I purchased this Pilates Ring. Not only am I able to strengthen my core, I am also able to raise my heart rate with the exercises on the enclosed poster. I received a personal email from the owner of Mantra Sports - and I had only positive comments about this product. In some ways, I see my injury as a blessing in disguise - an opportunity to strengthen another part of my body.
customer_reviews.author: ELS

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and good quality! It comes with a bag for storage and a chart for various exercises varying levels from intermediate to experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Just what the picture says!!
customer_reviews.text: Great easy product to add to your routine. Solid for your inner thighs or pair up with dumbbells to do crunches that will kill your lower abs and the coveted ‘v’ abs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pilates ring with bag and poster
customer_reviews.text: Sturdily-built and easy to use. It comes with a bag and a poster that shows various moves at 3 levels of intensity. A good choice!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Hurts!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a useless product. It hurts my LOWER Thigh. And I do have enough fat cushioning. I would like to return if possible. My only use was for a few seconds of trying repeatedly!
customer_reviews.author: Cockatiel Connection

customer_reviews.title: Not high enough quality. Not like the pilates studio rings. Not study enough.
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to the much sturdier Balance Body circles from the pilates studio, but Amazon didn’t have them. Hoped this would do the job. Needs to be much stronger. Already bends like cardboard and I’ve used it once. Would recommend buying a better one. Reviews were obviously misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: I love the product when it came. Very easy to use but it but within several weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product when it came. Very easy to use but it bent within several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Comes with instructions on how to use as well as a very nice case to store the instructions and ring
customer_reviews.author: Mark T. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Better Than the ones at the Gym
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and will last a long time. Very happy with my purchase, only thing I'd add is pads.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, great weight with a bonus exercise chart ...
customer_reviews.text: The challenge is on. Nicely made, great weight with a bonus exercise chart which helps a lot. It even comes with a bag which definitely comes in handy when away from home as I do take it with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with a bag which makes easy to take with you while traveling (and also I have extra space for more workout supplies!). I'm not quite satisfied with the workout poster, but I've been practicing pilates for 2 years so I have some knowledge of how to use the ring appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Liztellar

customer_reviews.title: Great core workout
customer_reviews.text: This Pilates ring is a great addition to my workout equipment. The chart that comes with the ring is very helpful. It not only works your core, but helps tone legs and arms as well. Definitely a great workout no matter what your age is.
customer_reviews.author: procho

customer_reviews.title: Works well and holding up so far
customer_reviews.text: Started a new program and love the ring. Helps with my pelvic floor and inner thigh muscles the most.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Diller

customer_reviews.title: I can use it anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described. Great price. I can use it anywhere. It works great for an crunches, in a chair or on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lanita

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother. She's 89 and loves it ! Very strong resistence and comfortable padding. I've been doing Pilates for 20 years and feel this is quality ring worth the price. Want to buy another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to home gym
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find the quality equal to what I use in studio. It even came with a poster of recommended exercises.
customer_reviews.author: relocators

customer_reviews.title: Toneing with the Mantra, I am also an artist, look me up!
customer_reviews.text: My thighs have gotten flabby , so when I got this I was excited. Great quality and simple to use. Convienent, and comfortable to use, what’s more important if you keep working it, it will do what it supposed to do. Comes in it’s own pouch, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kish

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t love it cause it wasn’t strong enough for me. A little flimsy. Good for starter or weaker legs
customer_reviews.author: AliciaA

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: This ring is perfect for many uses. I especially love how useful it is for stretches. It also works as a thigh master!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice Add to Your Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to home gym! Leave it in plain sight for inspiration! Great videos on youtube
customer_reviews.author: Regine Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: No exercise poster guide
customer_reviews.text: There were less expensive Pilates rings on the market but I decided to purchase this one in particular because it indicated that it included an exercise poster guide. The one I received came without the exercise poster.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Perez

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item, great diagrams... great for pilates exercises. Seems like it will last
customer_reviews.author: Fifty shades of annoyed

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described and there was fast shipping highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: B. Tuncay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty neat product. I instantly felt it when I used it for my inner thighs. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice Pilates gadget. I bought it for my daughter so she could improve her adductor strength for horseback riding.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy Di

customer_reviews.title: The pilates ring delivers
customer_reviews.text: The Pilates Ring adds a significant challenge to my Pilates routine. I am beginning to see results from the resistance it provides to my workout.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love the chart
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is more than I expected. Love the chart. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Busch

customer_reviews.title: Nice little ring
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ring! I’ve used it for just 1 week but already feel the difference in my inner thighs and surprisingly in my gluteus. I’ve also noticed thy my core is getting benefits too.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far very well made worth the price
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great, quick workout
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for quick home workouts. I especially appreciate the exercise poster & travel bag. This will be going with me!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Pipe

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Love the carrying bag. Would like the poster to not be a poster (a card is more usable). Still, very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Standre

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ring Used it once and it was all bent I returned it for a better quality
customer_reviews.author: Naava

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a helpful chart.
customer_reviews.text: I take this magic circle to Pilates Class. I also use it at home and when I travel. It’s very light weight, well made and with the right amount of resistance. The handles could have more padding thus the four stars instead of five. I found the enclosed chart very helpful when using the ring at home. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality exercise product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Loved the carrying case and exercise chart that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: shopping gal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that a newby, like me, could get the ring and a workout chart to show me the best ways to meet my goals.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't provide any resistance. And the middle part that your thigh's rest on hurt.
customer_reviews.author: sharee

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had time to use this a lot since I ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had time to use this a lot since I had back surgery immediately after receiving it but look forward to doing so... well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This equipment is good for exercising
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, only issue is the exercise poster, somewhat big.
customer_reviews.author: Amee

customer_reviews.title: Simple tool with many applications
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as I had been using one in a multi-sport training group. Very versatile piece of training equipment
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great Strengthening Ring
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. The ring is very sturdy and the pads are well-made. The seller reached out to me to ensure that I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ecolady

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun to work with :) Easy to use even for old people.
customer_reviews.author: Jitka

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: I used the ring 3-4 times/week, so not too often, and it came apart. I tried unsuccessfully to put it back together. I tossed it because it was useless once broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Yerkes

product_meta.title: MANTRA SPORTS Pilates Ring Magic Fitness Circle - Exercise Resistance Equipment for Toning & Sculpting Inner & Outer Thighs-Improve Core Power Strength, Flexibility & Posture-Workout Poster & Bag
feature_bullets: ✅ OPTIMAL RESISTANCE FOR FASTER RESULTS: Why settle for flimsy rings that can easily be squeezed together? Professional instructors developed our studio strength 14-inch ring so you won’t outgrow the tension-making it the only Pilates ring you’ll ever need!

✅ TAKE YOUR PILATES ANYWHERE, ANYTIME: Take your Pilates equipment to the office or studio with our double strap carry bag. Discretely tone those inner & outer thighs under your desk, store it neatly at home or pack it in your carry-on luggage if travelling.

✅ HUGE COLOR A1 SIZE EXERCISE POSTER INCLUDED: Our huge color wall chart looks great in any home gym & gives you instant access to the best illustrated exercises to improve agility, flexibility & posture. No eBooks or downloads needed-it's all in the box!

✅ ULTIMATE BODY WORKOUT & TONING: Why pay for gym & studio classes? Dual padded non-slip handles gives ultimate versatility to reduce lower back pain, aid surgery rehabilitation & develop stronger muscles in abs, legs, arms, chest, glutes, obliques & butt.

✅ ULTIMATE 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! Buy from us & you're backed by our legendary customer service – just see our reviews! If for any reason, you don't absolutely love your coquet joli, simply contact us & we will do whatever it takes to make it right!
